precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying program shortcuts and system options. The Start button will appear depressed.
No visual changes will occur on the Windows desktop.
The Start button will become highlighted, and the Start Menu will open, displaying program shortcuts and system options.

precondition: The application is running and the mouse cursor is visible.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will change to an hourglass icon.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open.
expected_results: No visual changes will occur in the Control Panel window.

precondition: The Control Panel window is active and displaying icons in the main area.
expected_results: The focus will shift to highlight the next icon to the right in the Control Panel's main area.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is in "Classic View" with icons displayed.
action: Hover the mouse cursor over the icons labeled "Mouse" and "Network Connections".
expected_results: A tooltip will appear displaying the text "Install or remove programs and Windows components."

precondition: The Control Panel window is open.
expected_results: A new window titled 'Power Options Properties' will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand, showing a list of hibernation time options.

precondition: The 'System hibernates' dropdown menu is expanded.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will collapse, displaying 'After 4 hours' as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is visible.
action: Click anywhere within the "Power Options Properties" dialog box.
expected_results: The dialog box will come into focus, and the system clock in the bottom right corner will update.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will close.

precondition: The Control Panel window is open.
expected_results: A dialog box titled 'Display Properties' will open. The address bar will update to 'Display Properties'.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open with the 'Themes' tab active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active, displaying screen saver settings.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Click the dropdown menu below the screen saver preview.
expected_results: A list of available screen saver options will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box with the 'Screen Saver' tab selected is visible.
action: Click anywhere on the desktop outside the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will close.

precondition: The Windows Control Panel is visible in "Category View."
action: Click the 'Start' button located in the bottom left corner of the screen.
expected_results: The screen will transition to the Windows Start Menu.
